Suggestions? feedback@trupay.me

store_info.title: UPI Money Transfer – Trupay
store_info.description:
If you face any problem, kindly mail us at support@trupay.in

With Trupay (UPI Payment App), you can pay/send money to anyone anytime directly through your bank account. It's a hassle free, secure and seamless payment option. You can also pay for utilities i.e. recharge your mobile, DTH etc. as well as can pay your postpaid bills for mobile, landline, gas and electricity via Trupay.
Send and request payments in real time using UPI (Unified Payment Interface).Now everyone can create payment id / Virtual Id / Bank Id on Trupay.

Features:-

• Send and Receive money: - One touch pay on the go. No tardy/cumbersome top-ups in e-wallets. No carrying debit and credit cards. Pay directly from your bank account through Aadhaar Payment enabled or UPI Mobile App.
• Pay your Utilities bills: - Why stand in a queue when you can pay all your bills in on tap that too without any extra charges! No additional charges.
• Transact up to 1 Lakh per transaction (24*7). Also on Saturday & Sunday. No bank holidays with us.
• Contri: - Want to split a bill? Use Contri to track all your payments and receive money from them directly into your bank account.
• Solidly Secure: - Trupay uses bank grade security systems and data encryption. Ensuring all transactions are fully secure with 2 Factor Authentication, 256-bit-end-to-end-encryption and SSL Certification.
• Go cashless directly at POS: - Receive money instantly at POS through Trupay app or plastic money.
• Cheapest Merchant Solution: - No intermediaries mean lowest transaction cost for our merchants. Our merchants can now offer you the best prices possible. Trupay offer solutions for both online and offline business.


We are among the India's first UPI enabled app / Payment Gateway App / Aadhaar Payment App to facilitate seamless payments to all banks from all banks ( At present live with 31+ Banks). Trupay is powered by Yes Bank.

Now you can even receive payments with our aadhaar merchant payment app, Trupay. Just enter the mobile number and receive payment within seconds.

Some of the banks on Trupay are: Andhra bank, Axis bank, Bank of Maharashtra, Bharatiya Mahila bank, Canara bank, Catholic Syrian bank, DCB Bank Ltd, Federal bank, HDFC BANK LTD, ICICI bank, IDBI Bank Limited, IDFC Bank, Karnataka Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Oriental bank of commerce, Punjab national bank, RBL, SBI, South Indian Bank, TJSB, UCO Bank, Union bank of India, United Bank of India, Vijaya bank, Yes bank Ltd. and more!

Everyone can create Payment ID/ Virtual ID/ UPI ID/ Virtual Payment ID etc. through Trupay.

Trupay also provides both modes of IMPS:-

1) IMPS Merchant payment based on Merchant mobile number and MMID or initiated from Merchant website (Pay via IMPS).
2) IMPS by adding beneficiary account number and filling IFSC code.

Trupay enables Interbank and Interbank Online Money Transfer (Mobile to Mobile, Mobile to Account) through Merchant Payment App.

We offer payment solution for websites, mobile apps and offline business as well. We provide our service in Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Mumbai, Pune and all other major cities in India.

SUPPORT:-

We are dedicated to offering the best possible experience to our users. If you run into any issues or have any suggestions, please reach out to us via the following channels:

Website - www.trupay.in
Merchant: - www.trupay.me

Experience the True way to pay with Trupay!

Happy payments guaranteed!
store_info.short_description: Pay directly from your bank a/c through UPI enabled app. Securely and Instantly!
